You can skip butter in tofu masala and replace it with coconut oil. Health benefits of Tofu:
  • Tofu is a good source of protein and contains all nine essential amino acids.
  • It is also an excellent source of iron and calcium and the minerals manganese, selenium and phosphorous.
  • Tofu is a good source of magnesium, copper, zinc and vitamin B1.
Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Tofu Masala:
  • Tofu - 250 gms - Chopped and stir fried
  • Onion - 1 medium sized - puree
  • Tomatoes - 2 medium sized - puree
  • Red chilly Powder - 1 tsp
  • Red paprika - 1 tsp
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Garam Masala Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Cashew Nuts - 8 - Paste - 2 Tb sp ( soak 10 mins & grind into fine paste)
  • Butter - 1 Tb sp
Tofu Kathi Roll:
  • Tofu Masala - 1 cup
  • Chapathi Â - 4 ( click for recipe)
  • Frankie Masala Powder ( click for recipe) - 1 Tb sp
  • White onion - finely chopped
  • Lemon juice - 1 Tb sp
Procedure: Tofu Masala Process:
  • First, Stir Fry Chopped Tofu on medium heatÂ by adding oil in a pan for 2 minutes each side
  • Fry till golden brown and take out in a bowl
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat Add butter, let it melt
  • Then Add grounded onion, sautÃ© 3 minutes
  • Next add salt, turmeric, red chilly powder and Garam masala powder. SautÃ© few seconds
  • Follows tomato purÃ©e, sautÃ© 5 minutes and then add cashew nut paste along with paprika
  • Combine well and add fried tofu. Gently mix, make sure each tofu coated with prepared masala
  • Saute a minute and turn off heat
  • Keep it aside
Process of Tofu Kathi Roll:
  • Take a plate, keep Chapathi on it and sprinkle Frankie Masala Powder and onion
  • Next, Spread Tofu Masala and lemon juice
  • Roll it tight and wrap with butter paper or aluminum foil
  • Tofu Kathi Roll is ready to serve
